name: claim_mission_reward
attributes: # [doc = " ミッション達成報酬を付与する  "]
# [doc = " （`mission_account` の owner チェックをまったく行っていないため、  "]
# [doc = "  攻撃者が他人のミッションアカウントを指定して  "]
# [doc = "  何度でも報酬を受け取れてしまいます）"]
body: let acc_info = & mut ctx . accounts . mission_account . to_account_info () ;
let data = & mut acc_info . data . borrow_mut () ;
let bit = 1u8 . checked_shl ((mission_id % 8) as u32) . unwrap_or (0) ;
let now = Clock :: get () ? . unix_timestamp as u64 ;
* * ctx . accounts . reward_pool . to_account_info () . lamports . borrow_mut () -= reward_amount ;
* * ctx . accounts . user . to_account_info () . lamports . borrow_mut () += reward_amount ;
msg ! ("Mission {} reward {} lamports claimed by {} at {}" , mission_id , reward_amount , ctx . accounts . user . key () , now) ;

fields.name: mission_account
fields.attribute: # [doc = " CHECK: owner == program_id の検証を一切行っていない AccountInfo"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: reward_pool
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 報酬プールアカウント（owner チェックなし）"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: user
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 報酬を受け取るユーザー（署名のみ検証）"] # [account (mut)]
